definition.name: Firefly Blade
specialInfo: A blade that warms itself deep within.
While your HP is more than 4; attacks with this blade stacks "Firefly's Ascent" by dealing 0.1 damage to user.
all stacks are converted into "Firefly's Descend" for 10 seconds.
Firefly's Descend lets you burn your target %20 chance for each level.
